Plot: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.
Title: Gran Torino
Writer: Nick Schenk (screenplay), Dave Johannson (story), Nick Schenk (story)
Actors: Clint Eastwood, Christopher Carley, Bee Vang, Ahney Her
tomatoConsensus: Though a minor entry in Eastwood's body of work, Gran Torino is nevertheless a humorous, touching, and intriguing old-school parable.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 20 wins & 17 nominations.
